name: Skyboy Minis: Droppy Treasure
description:
These two dwarves are trying to catch treasure falling from the sky. Why is there treasure falling from the sky?

Who knows!

Regardless, you must avoid cursed treasure while catching as much good treasure as you can.

This game was developed as part of a live-coding demonstration done for a class in Computer Game Design at George Mason University.

Sprites are from the 16-Bit Fantasy set from Oryx Design Lab.
